code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:63 year old white male presents with critical fever for 11 days. patient also reports critical dyspnea, critical cough, Respiratory. he denies drinking alcohol he smokes one pack/day for 3 years o:Height 72 in, Weight 133 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, Tissue Culture causative organism (+), Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Productive cough of dark yellow sputum, rhonchi-LU, rales Bil a:Bronchitis p:administered Azithromycin - 500 mg 1st day, 250 mg, daily x 4 days, performed Tissue Culture, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:white m aged 63 years presents with severe dyspnea, severe cough. he has history of severe shortness of breath. o:Height 73 in, Weight 136 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Pharynx washings cell-wall deficient organisms (+), Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, CTA-LL, crackles-LL, nose = nasal congestion a:Bronchitis p:administered Fluticasone (MDI) - 88 mcg inhaled, 2xday, performed Pharynx washings, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
